long_description: The Nau Motil pants are loaded with thoughtful features that you're sure to appreciate the next time you're biking around town or taking off on a traveling adventure. Comfortable organic cotton/polyester soft-shell fabric has a Durable Water Repellent coating to help shed moisture and speed drying time. Plenty of pockets: 2 hand pockets, 2 rear pockets, a zippered thigh pocket, a hidden cell phone pocket and a small coin pocket. Knee darts give the pants articulation for comfortable range of movement. Hems roll up to reveal reflective tape to increase your visibility during nighttime bike rides. The Nau Motil pants have a slim fit.
short_description: The Nau Motil pants are loaded with thoughtful features that you're sure to appreciate the next time you're biking around town or taking off on a traveling adventure.
